shortdesc.ph: Sets the allowlist of subscriptions for audio streams.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeAudioAllowlist(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int SetSubscribeAudioAllowlist(TArray<int64> uidList, int uidNumber);
public abstract int SetSubscribeAudioAllowlist(uint[] uidList, int uidNumber);
Future<void> setSubscribeAudioAllowlist( {required List<int> uidList, required int uidNumber});

section.title: Details
section.p: You can call this method to specify the audio streams of a user that you want to subscribe to.

ul.li: The allowlist is not affected by the setting in , and autoSubscribeAudio in .
Once the allowlist of subscriptions is set, it is effective even if you leave the current channel and rejoin the channel.

pt.props: android cpp unreal bp electron rn flutter unity cs

pd.p: The user ID list of users that you want to subscribe to.

If you want to specify the audio streams of a user for subscription, add the user ID in this list. If you want to remove a user from the allowlist, you need to call the method to update the user ID list; this means you only add the uid of users that you want to subscribe to in the new user ID list.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp electron unity rn flutter cs
plentry.pd: The number of users in the user ID list.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

li.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
